activity_name: The Plural of nouns is generally formed by adding -s to the singular

activity_desc: form their plural by changing -y into -i and adding -es

activity_name: The following nouns ending in -f or -fe form their plural by changing -for -fe into v and adding -es
There are a few nouns that form their plural by adding -en to the singular
Some nouns have the singular and the plural alike
A few nouns form their plural by changing the inside vowel of the singular
A Compound Noun generally forms its plural by adding -s to the principal word
Proper nouns do not have plurals
Uncountable nouns do not have a plural form
